LanguageData.ARA_Medicine.label: Arachnae Fuser
LanguageData.ARA_Medicine.description: Medicine produced from an Arachnae Hatching Cocoon. It has the same effect as normal medicine but requires refrigeration.
LanguageData.ARA_PheromoneSolvent.label: Arachnae Pheromone Solvent
LanguageData.ARA_PheromoneSolvent.description: A synthetic chemical designed to mimic the pheromones used by the Arachnae swarm to distinguish friend from foe. Regular injection deceives the parasite within the host, inducing a symbiotic dormant state and inhibiting fatal proliferation behavior.
